Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###DynamicFieldsOverviewPageShown
Setting.Description: Parameters for the pages (in which the dynamic fields are shown) of the dynamic fields overview. Please note: setting 'Active' to 0 will only prevent agents from editing settings of this group in their personal preferences, but will still allow administrators to edit the settings of another user's behalf. Use 'PreferenceGroup' to control in which area these settings should be shown in the user interface.

Hash.Item: Dynamic fields limit per page for Dynamic Fields Overview.

Setting.Name: DynamicField::Namespaces
Setting.Description: Define possible namespaces for dynamic fields. Must only contain alphanumeric characters. A namespace must not be longer than 64 characters. Namespace plus dynamic field name must not exceed 190 characters.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###4000-ScriptDynamicFields
Setting.Description: Evaluate all script fields.

Setting.Name: DynamicField::EventModulePost###300-DeleteScriptFieldEvents
Setting.Description: Dynamic field event module that deletes script field events if a dynamic field of type script gets deleted.

Setting.Name: DynamicField::EventModulePost###400-UpdateSetFieldInclusions
Setting.Description: Dynamic field event module that updates PartOfSet attributes of fields which are included in a set.
